attributes.action: create waste vegetable oil recycling centres for bio diesel production
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Waste vegetable oil (WVO) is usually disposed of and not recycled in the average UK household. There about about 30 million homes in the UK, each producing about 1/2 to 1 litre of waste vetetable oil per week on average. The WVO can then be used to make bio diesel with its associated environmental benefits.
